## Purpose

The purpose of this site is to convey research to a broader public. 


## Contact 


My name is Joseph Bulbulia (Joe). I am a professor of psychology at Victoria of University in Wellington NZ, and an adjunct professor in Psychology at the University of Canterbury [Here](https://www.canterbury.ac.nz/science/schools/psyc-speech-hear/people/), and an associate researcher at the Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology [Here](https://www.eva.mpg.de/linguistic-and-cultural-evolution/staff/)

My email address is: joseph.bulbulia@vuw.ac.nz
